page.title: 16PEOPLES ATTITUDES
page.content:
I interviewed a couple in our area and found out their attitude to life. These are their comments. People have forgotten how to look after things. They have no respect for life or property. I think the country is going from bad to worse. There are no tradesmen left. Vandalism and mugging are getting worse. Peoples attitudes to each other need to be changed.
Most of the people in our area are middle class, conservative in their outlook and with a large proportion of retired and older people. They are interested in preserving amenities.
